PhaseGen
  • Welcome to PhaseGen’s documentation
  • View page source

Welcome to PhaseGen’s documentation

PhaseGen is a package for simulating and making inference on coalescent distributions.

  • Introduction
    • Motivation
    • How it works
    • Features
